com.shop.util.generic
Interface GenericIOServer<T>

public interface GenericIOServer<T>

Server abstraction. Use GenericIOFactory to allocate a new server. start() must then be called

Method Summary
 java.util.List<java.lang.Exception> close()
          Shutdown/close the server (closing all connections, etc.)
 java.util.List<GenericIOClient<T>> getClients()
          Returns a list of all currently connected clients
 int getPort()
          Return the port the server is listening on
 T getUserValue()
          Returns the value set via setUserValue(Object)
 void runInThread(java.lang.Runnable r)
          Utility to run a process using the servers thread pool
 void setUserValue(T value)
          Associate a custom value with this server.
 void start()
          Start the server
